title: description
Alicia Keys' Fallin: A blue variant of the Frances Ann Cocktail. As blue as Alicia Keys' pain.

title: notes
Alicia Keys' Fallin: Scotch, Dry Vermouth and a hint of someone.

title: pairing
Alicia Keys' Fallin: Alicia Keys has it with a blue Shirred Eggs and strudel.

title: serving_suggestion
Alicia Keys' Fallin: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the blue sounds of Fallin.
